title: At the Restaurant
description: Enhance your English communication skills with phrases commonly used in a restaurant. Focus on clear pronunciation and proper intonation.
instructions: Below, you'll find a list of phrases you might use in a restaurant.
Aim for clear and natural pronunciation.
Keep your pace steady and conversational.
After recording, listen to the playback and compare it to the written text.
Pay special attention to the intonation, clarity, and fluency.
Repeat the recording process as necessary to improve your pronunciation.

items.question: I'd like a table for two.
items.answer: I'd like a table for two.
